meanings.sent1: The curtainless window let in a lot of sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The room looked bright and airy with its curtainless windows.
meanings.sent3: The curtainless window felt like a wide-open eye staring into the room.
meanings.sent4: The curtainless view revealed the beauty of the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The curtainless window made the room feel spacious and open.

meanings.sent1: She preferred a curtainless room to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a charmingly curtainless look.
meanings.sent3: The curtainless windows gave the room a minimalist vibe.
meanings.sent4: The curtainless design added a modern touch to the space.
meanings.sent5: The curtainless room felt refreshing and uncluttered.
